structures
Class Counter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      structures.Counter

public class Counter
extends java.util.Observable

Title: Class Counter

Description: A simple Counter object for maintaining a counter. An OO approach to keeping a simple integer count variable. Who said OO concepts were miles off the path of simplicity and common sense? And just to be non-java or c, it starts at 1!/p>

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: University of Hertfordshire

Version:
1.0 Initial Release, 1.1 Now an Observable with toString(), 1.2 synchronized methods - makes bugger all difference
Author:
Kevin Doherty (e-mail K.A.J.Doherty@herts.ac.uk)
